admin.description: Default provider based on WebRTC standard. Let users to place peer to peer call. No browser plugin needed.
admin.title: WebRTC settings
admin.serversTip: STUN/TURN servers dey required to ensure say web conferencing calls go work wella for across network routers. We go highly recommend say you set up your own private TURN sever so you go fit get control for de security of your communication and go con ensure say maximum availability dey.
admin.noServer: No server available, please add your first one
admin.serverRemoveText: You sure say you won comot dis server configuration?
admin.enableLogCollection: Make you enable client-side log collection
admin.logCollectionInfo: Dis flag go log information from client for inside de server logs for am to fit troubleshoot WebRTC connectivity issue. Use am carefully, dis mode dey verbose and go fit cause some kind better network overhead.
